trans-unit.source: Provides theme settings for activity designers that use a preview mode on the workflow design surface.
This class cannot be inherited.

> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] Activity designers that use preview mode on the workflow design surface can have theme settings specific to the preview display area.
ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme contains the properties that provide these preview-area specific settings.

Activities that provide a preview mode when they are added to the workflow design surface include <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ConditionedActivityGroup> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme"></xref> class.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowTheme"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme"></xref> is associated with.
Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.

Performs any additional initialization tasks for <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme"></xref> that is not performed by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme.%23ctor%2A>.

If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme.UseOperatingSystemSettings%2A> is set to `true`, Initialize sets all <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme> properties to reflect the style settings of the operating system on which Windows Workflow Foundation is installed.
Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesignerTheme"></xref> that the ambient property settings for the designer have changed.
OnAmbientPropertyChanged checks the value passed to `ambientProperty` and applies the appropriate ambient theme settings based on that value.
If the value is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>, it applies the ambient styles provided by the designer.
If the value is <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty>, it applies the ambient styles provided by the operating system.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientProperty"></xref> enumeration value that the activity preview designer theme should now use.
Gets or sets the color set to associate with the background of the activity preview section of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to associate with the background of the activity preview section of the designer.
Gets or sets the color set to associate with the border of the activity preview section of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to associate with the border of the activity preview section of the designer.
Gets or sets the color set to associate with the foreground of the activity preview section of the designer.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> to associate with the foreground of the activity preview section of the designer.
